name: Call to Power 2

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Call To Power 2/ctp2_program/ctp/ctp2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: 1.9.15-x86_64
